description: ff. 6. 202 x 145; 147 x 110 mm. 17 lin. Rabīʻ I, 618, ʻĀmir ibn ḥassān ibn ʻĀmir ibn Fityān; on fol. 5b-6b seven samāʻ notes. Acephalous 20th (last) juzʼ: ḥājjī Khalīfah, Kashf al-ẓunūn, col. 722. Incip. (as extant): ... ابن محمد بن اسمعىل القاضى مآ مسدد بن مسرهد مآ عىسى بن ىونس ... عن على رضى الله عنه ان رسول الله ... کان ىقرأ القران على کل حال
author: Khilaʻī, ʻAlī ibn al-ḥasan, d. 1099
title: al-Khilaʻīyāt fī ajzāʼ al-ḥadīth.
creator: Khilaʻī, ʻAlī ibn al-ḥasan, d. 1099
subject: Hadith—Texts—Early works to 1800
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
